task.title: Managing referenced services
task.shortdesc: A service projection enables a business entity to reference a service that was published by another business entity. By using the businessService structure as a projection to an already published businessService, businesses can share or reuse services. Service projections are managed centrally as part of the referencing businessEntity.

taskbody.prereq:
Prerequisites:
Register with a registry
Launch the Web Services Explorer
Add the registry to the Web Services Explorer

context.p: For more information on referenced services, refer to the UDDI Version 2.0 Programmer's API Specification and the UDDI Version 2.0 Data Structure Specification.
To manage referenced services, do the following:

step.cmd: In the Navigator pane, select the business entity for which you want to manage referenced services.
In the Actions pane toolbar, click the Manage Referenced Services icon .
On the Manage Referenced Services page you can add, remove, and maintain services that are referenced by the business entity.
